TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

On DATE CARDINAL police officers from the FAC police ( милиция метро ) at LOC railway station in GPE , GPE NORP , arrested the applicant and another person , NORP , on suspicion of burglary . They took them to the FAC police station for questioning and urged the applicant to confess . The applicant refused and asked to be provided with a lawyer . Angry about this request , the policemen punched the applicant in the upper body and the head .

CARDINAL . Later , the policemen took the applicant to a special FAC police station for further questioning . According to the applicant , as soon as the interrogation had begun , the policemen beat him to make him sign a confession they had prepared . The applicant refused to sign . Angry about this refusal , the policemen cuffed the applicant ’s hands behind his back , dropped him on the floor , and applied electric shocks to his neck , kidney and liver areas and private parts . TIME the policemen told the applicant that they would hand him over to officers from the PERSON district police station because the burglary had been committed in that district .

CARDINAL . On DATE the staff at the first - aid point recorded the following injuries sustained by the applicant :
“ Bruises on the soft tissue of the left auricle , right forefinger and right elbow joint and an abrasion on the left shin . ”

CARDINAL . On DATE the FAC public prosecutor refused to institute criminal proceedings against the alleged perpetrators on the ground that there was no indication that a crime had been committed . On DATE the applicant asked the GPE public prosecutor to quash the decision of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the GPE public prosecutor quashed the decision of DATE rendered by the FAC public prosecutor and referred the case back for further investigation .

CARDINAL . NORP DATE , criminal proceedings in GPE were governed by LAW RSFSR ( the old ORG ) . Under LAW ORG , a refusal to open criminal proceedings could be appealed against to a prosecutor or a court . Under LAW , a refusal by the prosecutor could be appealed against to a higher prosecutor .

CARDINAL . On DATE the old Code was replaced by LAW ( the new ORG ) . LAW ORG provides for judicial review of decisions by investigators and prosecutors that might infringe the constitutional rights of participants in proceedings or prevent access to a court .
